articles.content:
Controversial Activision Blizzard boss Bobby Kotick will depart the company on 29th December, it's been announced. 
Kotick's reign lasted 32 years, during which time the company became one of the bi… [+3759 chars]

articles.title: Minute-scale oscillatory sequences in medial entorhinal cortex - Nature.com
articles.description: Neural population activity in the medial entorhinal cortex of mice can be organized into ultraslow oscillatory sequences, with periods extending up to the minute range.

articles.author: Maziar Motamedi
articles.title: Are Houthi Red Sea attacks hurting Israel and disrupting global trade? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The Houthis attack ships in one of the busiest maritime routes as they demand Israel to end its brutal war in Gaza.
articles.content: Some of the largest shipping companies in the world have been forced to reroute their vessels at considerable costs after Yemens Houthi group targeted ships headed towards Israeli ports in solidarity… [+6337 chars]
